ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you ever used alcohol at the same time as cannabis, that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: Have you ever used alcohol at the same time as opiates (e.g., heroin, opium, etc.), that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: Have you ever used alcohol at the same time as prescription stimulants (e.g., dextroamphetamine: Dexedrine, dextroamphetamine/amphetamine: Adderall, methylphenidate: Ritalin and Concerta), that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: Within the past 2 months, how often did you use alcohol at the same time as cannabis, that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than once per month; 2 = Once a month; 3 = Two times a month; 4 = Three times a month; 5 = Once a week; 6 = Twice a week; 7 = Three times a week; 8 = Four times a week; 9 = Five times a week; 10 = Six times a week; 11 = Every day; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -9 = Item skipped by show-if logic; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: Within the past 2 months, how often did you use alcohol at the same time as opiates (e.g., heroin, opium, etc.), that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than once per month; 2 = Once a month; 3 = Two times a month; 4 = Three times a month; 5 = Once a week; 6 = Twice a week; 7 = Three times a week; 8 = Four times a week; 9 = Five times a week; 10 = Six times a week; 11 = Every day; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -9 = Item skipped by show-if logic; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: Within the past 2 months, how frequently did you use alcohol at the same time as prescription stimulants (e.g., dextroamphetamine: Dexedrine, dextroamphetamine/amphetamine: Adderall, methylphenidate: Ritalin and Concerta), that is, so that their effects overlap?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than once per month; 2 = Once a month; 3 = Two times a month; 4 = Three times a month; 5 = Once a week; 6 = Twice a week; 7 = Three times a week; 8 = Four times a week; 9 = Five times a week; 10 = Six times a week; 11 = Every day; -5 = Item seen but not answered; -9 = Item skipped by show-if logic; -999 = Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)
